toggles.description: Enable pooling of receive buffers on Netty 4
Enable native epoll transport for netty4. Requires linux-x86_64

Enable reference leak tracking. Exports a counter to 'finagle/netty4/reference_leaks'. Requires io.netty.leakDetectionLevel env variable >= simple. See https://netty.io/wiki/reference-counted-objects.html#wiki-h3-11
